Accounting for plane usage in year Cc we have discussed the accounting for plane uasage on year and have determined that the actual trip costs will be billed direct to the users RC However the budget costs for the plane have been included in Dan McCartys executive RC budget Thus we will have to develop a procedure to charge the RC for atctual costs but credit the plane budget and maintain some control as to the overall status of the budget Who would you like me to work with to developcoordinate these procedures Thanks

Objective Report Cc on the Pipeline Group objectives you should consider the NNG base gas sale as a major contributor in meeting and exceeding this objective I discussed this with Dan McCarty and he suggested I send you a note to include it in the first pass If you need any help on the amount etc let me know Mike McGowan

Request by Ashley Cc I just recieved Ashleys request for support for her trip to Las Vegas and I am pleased to inform you that ETS will provide her with to assist in her expenses It sounds like quite an honor and I am sure you are quite proud of her A check will be processed and sent to you Please tell Ashley that she did an excellent job of drafting the request I could tell that she spent extra time and effort on it All of us wish her good luck in the competition Please let us know how she does Mike McGowan
